column1: #text=The other day I went for a ride in an airplane .
#text=I drove to the airport with my significant other and we took our bags .
#text=We stood in line to check our bags and receive our tickets .
#text=We also had to go through a security checkpoint .
#text=Once on the plane you wait a little while for everyone to be seated and then the pilot announces that the plain will be taking off .
#text=When the plane is going up into the air it can feel kind of funny but once the plane reaches a certain height it is usually smooth sailing .
#text=There can sometimes be some turbulence but there is usually just a smooth ride .
#text=Sometimes a flight attendant asks you if you want anything like something to drink or eat .
#text=There is a bathroom on the plane if you have to go and you can even shave in there .
#text=Once you get off the plane you grab your bags and off you can go safely .
